body: Hi, I have updated the PR with another commit.  Please have another look, thanks.

@tonic889 changes look good. But its advised not to have multiple commits in one PR.
So can you please squash these commits to one and resend the PR.

@Nenge1 While reviewing the PR, I observed few other scenarios which I mentioned in the JIRA issue.
Those needs to be addressed before fixing the current issue
I believe I have squashed the commits properly, please have a look once.  Thanks.

Hi Kumarnath,

There is one  more PR for same ticket , Fineract-428?

https://github.com/apache/fineract/pull/464

Hi Santosh!
Ticket, Fineract-428 will have multiple PRs since it takes into account all
jobs intended for parallelizing and paging. Each job will have a separate PR

Hope it answers your question.

Regards,
Kumaranath Fernando

@conradsp Would you be able to merge this PR now that it has been approved?  Thanks, Brian

@nikpawar89 , @avikganguly01 ,
How soon will this be merged into Fineract and the comm-app. There are some good updates inside of 18.03.01 that would be nice to have with this included onto them
@conradsp kindly review this PR. My other ticket is dependent on the newly added file in this PR.  And there will be conflict if I create same files again. Thank you
Hello @ShruthiRajaram , thank you for your comments, am working on them

Hello @ShruthiRajaram 
I have already updated the PR with change of implementation, if the loan products should not co-exist, its enough to be checked on the time of application, please review
Hello @ShruthiRajaram Can you help to review this too

@MexinaD  I think there is a little confusion over my last comment. I was completely fine with validation during disbursal and submission. All I wanted to convey was, change the method signature of "checkForProductMixRestrictions" and "checkForProductMixRestrictions" present in LoanWritePlatformServiceJpaRepositoryImpl, so that you can have a common method and call it from  "LoanApplicationWritePlatformServiceJpaRepositoryImpl" and "LoanWritePlatformServiceJpaRepositoryImpl". So that you handle all the scenarios you described previously. I believe the current change checks only during submission. If you want to check only during the submission and not during disbursal for existing loans, let me know I will approve the change.

Hello @ShruthiRajaram I think if the loan has already passed the state of approval that means the user was okay with their co-existence at the time he/she was approving the loan, So i want the check to be on submission
@wkk91193   kindly squash commits.
As it is related to front end, closing the PR

Hello @ShruthiRajaram 
The issue is in back end and not front end, since the permissions are created by schema and not through front end.

Hi @MexinaD , I understand that permissions are stored in db. But the logic for the post as on date is present under a different class with different permission. 
And the permission which were referred in the front end was invalid as there is no handler for that permission. So we corrected the permission in the front end to work properly.

Hello @ShruthiRajaram 
Thank you for that clarifications
@Sanyam96 , kindly resolve the conflicts and squash the commits.
@Ippezrobert  kindly add the JIRA id for this PR
When i import client data its show sucess but no client imported.
@raakeshtomarnew kindly refer https://github.com/apache/fineract/pull/488 PR and when you try to reproduce the scenario kindly enable address configuration.

Hello @ShruthiRajaram 
It seems you have handled during uploading the system to allow the Account id with Long datatype so as to accommodate the big number.

But i have see other case where if the loan accounts have account preferences the system don't allow to download since they are in a format like "MFL000000021"  which is not a number.

I think its better to handle these issues together.
@MexinaD thanks for the input. I will try to include that modification as well
Hi @MexinaD I have made changes that fixes both download and upload of bulk loan repayment transaction (with/without account number preferences enabled) . Kindly review.

@avikganguly01 , @ShruthiRajaram, @raakeshtomarnew, @nazeer1100126, Ed Cable and others, is it possible to review this and make it as part of the next release since people are nearing end of year where expenses and income have to be booked-off for beginning of year. The Front-end has not been developed so someone good at front-end dev can take on it. Thanks

yes
its useful.
Thanks

Hello @ShruthiRajaram
I tested and it worked fine.
@MexinaD Can you review and provide feedback/approve the PR?
Reviewed and can be merged

@nikpawar89 , @avikganguly01 , @nazeer1100126 and @vidakovic kindly review this PR.
@Sanyam96   can you check the file "fineract-provider.iml" , I think this will break the deployment.

Okay, I'll check and remove the 'fineract-provider.iml' file
Might be pushed because of IntelliJ IDEA.
@Sanyam96  kindly squash commits.

@Sanyam96 looks like the type of on variable in ClientData changed... could you take care of that and update the Swagger documentation accordingly? I'll do then a final check... the rest still looks good to me. Maybe we can get this done over the weekend/early next week? Ping me if you need anything.

@vidakovic the variable changed in the latest merge with develop branch with some other PR #488 
I'll solve the merge conflicts again very soon
I have solved the merge conflicts
@vidakovic  thanks for the review. @Sanyam96 has resolved issues mentioned and no other changes were introduced. So merged the PR.
:tada: @Sanyam96 .... thanks @ShruthiRajaram for the merge
@avikganguly01 , Could you review this if time permits?
I have Rahul and Sanyam trying to review as well.
Not Solved same problem
@gkrishnan724 , @ShruthiRajaram , please review the PR.
@ShruthiRajaram I have updated the PR, please review. :smile:

@ShruthiRajaram Sorry for the late reply. If I remove the description field the request is completed successfully and I'm also able to retrieve the product.

I'm unable to find the class where the saving product table is created. Can you please help me with that?

- Creating a product without description:
![screenshot from 2018-11-30 13-19-25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28915865/49275861-b5656300-f4a2-11e8-85d4-ed3b0b98c18c.png)

- Retrieving the created product:
![screenshot from 2018-11-30 13-22-28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28915865/49275968-0412fd00-f4a3-11e8-9334-77560bae6913.png)

I have found 3 instances where a table called `m_savings_product` is being created with the **description** column marked with `NOT NULL` constraint. The instances reside in the following files:
- fineract/fineract-provider/src/main/resources/sql/migrations/core_db/V1__mifosplatform-core-ddl-latest.sql
- fineract/fineract-provider/src/main/resources/sql/migrations/sample_data/barebones_db.sql
- fineract/fineract-provider/src/main/resources/sql/migrations/sample_data/load_sample_data.sql

@m-sameer the solution proposed by you is working because by default an empty string is getting assigned to description field in SavingsProductAssembler. So this is not the right way to fix the issue. I would say a migration script should be written to alter the m_savings_product and make description field to accept the null value. Then in the SavingsProduct class make appropriate change. And on top of all these, change proposed by you should be applied.
@ShruthiRajaram If writing the migration script is part of this PR, can you please guide me how to write it? :)

@m-sameer goto location fineract-provider\src\main\resources\sql\migrations\core_db in your system.  choose the next number available. Follow the naming convention and name your file containing the script to alter the savings product table. On the next server start this script will execute and will alter the table. If the script didn't execute  check the file name or if the table is not modified check the query.

@ShruthiRajaram I have updated the PR. I have tested the changes on RESTClient, now there is no description field with an empty string in the case when no description is provided on product creation. Please review.

Thank you once again!
@m-sameer changes look good. But someone has already raised a PR with V344. So can you use V346 as your migration script number and resend the PR. I will merge.
@ShruthiRajaram The next version will be V345 instead of V346, which one should I use?
V345 is already merged. Use V346
@ShruthiRajaram Done!
@m-sameer use '-' (underscore) instead of '-' in the migration script name. I should have told this before, Sorry for that. We faced issue when we tried to modify the file containing hyphen before.
@ShruthiRajaram No problem. I have made the changes.
@ShruthiRajaram Any updates?
@m-sameer good job :)
@ShruthiRajaram Thanks! :smiley:
works on top of https://github.com/apache/fineract/pull/441
Hi @MexinaD, run 1. ./gradlew -Penv=dev clean cleanEclipse eclipse and 2. ./gradlew -Penv=dev clean war then run the server. You will be able to build it successfully.
Hi @rahulg963 and @rrpawar96 How is this task looking for shipment in 1.3?
@MexinaD  kindly review
@rrpawar96 your contribution is valuable. Kindly address the comments , so that this can be included in Fineract 1.3 release.
@avikganguly01 kindly review this PR
@avikganguly01 kindly review this PR

@rrpawar96 Please solve the merge conflicts.

@edcable @ShruthiRajaram
@rahulg963 , @rrpawar96 has raised PR here #504 . Please check
Thanks!
Ok guys. Kindly guide on how I update my fineractplatform-18.03.01.RELEASE from this point?
Related ticket: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/FINERACT-695
@rahulg963 , Can you merge it?

@ShruthiRajaram  The formula cell nullpointer exception was causing https://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/FINERACT-660 issue. Does this PR need to have its specific JIRA issue to be merged or i can merge it to solve this crucial issue?

@AvinashKumarG thank you for your interest in Mifos.  I'm an (old) volunteer who got reminded of Mifos this week-end at the FOSDEM conference, and I'm taking a moment to help the project clean up some of it's old issues and pull requests etc.  

Given that there was no reaction to above in over 1 year, I took the liberty to close this PR, to avoid confusion for future new contributors looking at this repository - hope you understand and that's fair.

We were wondering whether you are still alive, and would be willing to rebase this PR and take any previous review feedback into account?  If we don't hear from you within 2 weeks, we will take the liberty to close this PR, to avoid confusion for future new contributors looking at this repository - hope you understand and that's fair.

If we don't hear from you within 2 weeks, we will take the liberty to close this PR without merging it, to avoid confusion for future new contributors looking at this repository - hope you understand and that's fair.
